Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I am a little bit newer in KSP and stuff, but I have gotten a project in my mind.

I am not really familiar with the forums, so I decided to post it here since there's no real "community project" places on the forums.

On to the project:

KerbinDOT stands for Kerbin Development of Transportation.

Getting it?

I would love to cover Kerbin with a gigantic highway, running around major geographical features. The highway can contain bridges, but it's going to be a great idea to actually model around the major geographical features such as mountains and lakes. Since modifying the planet is WAY too far, I think that simply putting a model around these features is going to be good.

It is impossible to do this alone, this is why I posted this on the forums as a community project.

First, we need a map of Kerbin with elevations. Something along these lines:

Then, we would need to draw the highway line going around the geographical features. Then, it would be a great idea if we can find the actual 3D model of Kerbin in actual size. After that, the segmental building process may begin.

One more thing.

This is for KSP 0.24.2, and we would use the KerbTown mod for help.

I really hope to receive support for this big oncoming project.

Thank you.
